TVCU Riverfront Nights

    TVCU Riverfront Nights

    When: 2024-08-17 (Friday)
    Time: 6pm - 10pm
    Address: 201 Riverfront Pkwy, Chattanooga, TN 37402
    Entrance Fee: Free
    Event Website
      #music#free#outside

    The summer season at Ross’s Landing is highlighted by the “Fourteen Saturdays of Summer” event, spanning every Saturday from Memorial Day through Labor Day. This free outdoor concert series showcases a lineup of the area’s most dynamic and impressive musical acts, providing an entertaining escape under the stars.

    Guests are invited to bring their chairs and blankets, and pets on leashes are also welcome. For the best spots, arriving early is recommended. A variety of food and drinks will be available for purchase from local vendors at the venue.

    The festivities begin with concession stands opening at 6:00 pm*, followed by live music performances from 7:00 pm until 10:00 pm each Saturday. This is an ideal opportunity for community members to enjoy the warm evenings filled with good music and great company.


    Lineup:
    May 25th: A1A: A TRIBUTE TO JIMMY BUFFET BAND and OGYA WORLD MUSIC BAND
    June 1st: STRUNG LIKE A HORSE and LENOX HILLS
    June 8th: THE MCCRARY SISTERS and LUKE SIMMONS & THE LOVESTRUCK
    June 15th: R&B INC & BEE TAYLOR
    June 29nd: ON THE BORDER: A TRIBUTE TO THE EAGLES and BIAS
    July 6th: RUBIKS GROOVE and SCOTT MULVAHILL
    July 13th: THE PETERSON BROTHERS and SWAYYVO
    July 20th: EARTH TO MARS: A BRUNO MARS EXPERIENCE and PAUL CHILDERS BAND
    July 27th: MIKE FARRIS & THE FORTUNATE FEW and PAUL MCDONALD & THE MOURNING DOVES
    August 3rd: DRVIN' N CRYIN' and SCARLET LOVE CONSPIRACY
    August 10th: BACK 2 MAC: A TRIBUTE TO FLEETWOOD MAC and THE ESSENTIALS
    August 17th: DEPARTURE: A TRIBUTE TO JOURNEY and MOON JUICE
    August 24th: THE AFTERNOONERS and ET CETERA
    August 31st: THE MALEMEN: A NIGHT OF MOTOWN and RICK RUSHING * THE BLUES STRANGERS

    Visit the event website for more information
